actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the National Housing Act, to make any Federal savings and loan association or State chartered mutual savings and loan association which converts to a stock savings and loan institution ineligible for insurance under this title.

summary.text: Makes any Federal savings and loan association or State chartered mutual savings and loan association which converts to a stock savings and loan institution ineligible for insurance under title IV of the National Housing Act. (Adds 12 U.S.C. 1726(e))

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV of the National Housing Act, to make any Federal savings and loan association or State chartered mutual savings and loan association which converts to a stock savings and loan institution ineligible for insurance under this title.
